trans-unit.source: Provides the system implementation for displaying a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
The ContextMenuService class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuService 類別提供可用來指定的外觀和內容功能表中的位置附加的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Many of the properties in the ContextMenuService class are also defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>也會定義許多 ContextMenuService 類別中的屬性

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the ContextMenuService class than by setting the properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 有時候會更方便使用 ContextMenuService 類別比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>上設定屬性，設定屬性

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> to be shared by multiple elements, but use the ContextMenuService class to specify a different position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> for each element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>若要由多個項目共用，但使用 ContextMenuService 類別指定不同位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>每個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and ContextMenuService classes.
If any of these properties are set on both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and the ContextMenuService, the property value from the ContextMenuService is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一這些屬性上同時設定了<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>並用 ContextMenuService，屬性值從 ContextMenuService。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> You can also use the ContextMenuService to display menus on disabled items.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty>-<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A>您也可以使用 ContextMenuService 以停用的項目上顯示的功能表。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Object to query concerning whether it has a drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢是否有陰影的物件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value, **true** if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> has a drop shadow; **false** otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 布林值， **true**如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>有陰影。**false**否則。
